Cards.chat: show information in as Chat message

Spendings.knackSourceNotFound: The Knack is not referenced in any Talent of the Actor
Spendings.knackSourceNotHighEnough: The Rank of the Talent is not high enough

Button.applyDamageTitle: Assign the Damage to the Targets!
Button.applyEffectTitle: Assign the Effect to the Targets!
Button.takeDamageTitle: Take the damage for your Actor

Flavor.rollEquipmentMultipleTargets: {sourceActor} uses {equipment} with step {arbitraryStep} against many Targets
Flavor.jumpUp: {sourceActor} tries to jump up with Step {step}
Flavor.knockdownTest: {sourceActor} tries to avoid being knocked down with Step {step}
Flavor.rollAbilityMultipleTargets: {sourceActor} uses {Ability} with step {abilityFinalStep} against many Targets
Flavor.rollAttackMultipleTargets: {sourceActor} uses {Ability} ({weapon}) with step {abilityFinalStep} against many Targets

Labels.isMob: This Actor uses only Wounds instead of Damage

Armor.living: This item counts as living Armor.

Hints.edid: An ID to identify an item without considering its name
Hints.livingArmorOnly: This item is considered as living armor.

Dialogs.jumpUpChoice: Chose the Ability to jump up
Dialogs.knockDownChoice: Chose the Ability to withstand the Knock Down

Notification.knackSourceNotFound: The Knack is not referenced in any Talent of the Actor
Notification.knackSourceNotHighEnough: The Rank of the Talent is not high enough
Notification.knackSourceMultipleTalents: The Knack is referenced in multiple Talents of the Actor

Info.noMoreItemsOfThisType: This Item cannot be added again to this Actor.
Info.notAddedforTheActor: This Item is not meant for this Actor.

Warn.livingArmorOnly: This namegiver can only wear living armor.
Warn.piecemealArmorSizeExceeded: Maximum amount of piecemeal armor reached. Unequip other parts to equip the new piece.

Edid.knockDownHint: ED-ID for the Knock Down Test ability
Edid.languageRWHint: ED-ID for the Read/Write Language ability
Edid.languageSpeakHint: ED-ID for the Speak Language ability
Edid.spellCastingHint: Identifies a talent that is used for spellcasting
Edid.threadWeavingHint: Identifies a talent that is used for thread weaving
Edid.VersatilityHint: Identifies a talent that is used for versatility

Hint.enforceLivingArmor: Enforce that only living armor can be equipped
